word: I saw that Brother and Sister Edson would have to move soon from the place where they now live, for there was enmity enough in the hearts of the wicked there to take their lives for they hated them for the truths they believed and have advocated for it condemned them, and a number of times the wicked had it in their hearts to take the lives of Brother and Sister Edson; but God had defeated the wicked, and guarded their lives.--Ms 7, 1850, pp. 1- 5. ("A Vision the Lord Gave Me at Bro. Harris', August 24, 1850.)
